gov.lanl.adore.djatoka.plugin
Class ImageWatermark

java.lang.Object
  gov.lanl.adore.djatoka.plugin.TextWatermark
      gov.lanl.adore.djatoka.plugin.ImageWatermark
All Implemented Interfaces:
ITransformPlugIn
public class ImageWatermark
extends TextWatermark

Extends TextWatermark to provide an overlaid image watermark in additional to the text watermark. Simply, set the statement value to "" to prevent the textual watermark.

Author:
Ryan Chute

isTransformable

public boolean isTransformable()
Returns boolean indicator whether or not an image is transformable based on the global and instance properties. This is very helpful for cache logic.
